title: Get Over It!
description: Get Over It! traces the path from heartbreak to happiness, using humor and honesty to describe each break-up milestone. A few, very long years ago, Corinne Mucha ( Tales of 9th Grade Obsessions, Revelations, and Other Nonsense , Zest Books) began exploring the strange behaviors of her own broken heart. Both giggle- and cringe- inducing, Get Over It! gives us all the gory, gooey details on the way to wisdom.
author: Corinne Mucha
